articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides First Meeting of Airpersons of KPA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides First Meeting of Airpersons of KPA
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- The first meeting of airpersons of the Korean People's Army (KPA) was held with splendor here on April 15.
					 Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, guided the meeting.
					
					 The meeting was a historic grand assembly attended by all airpersons of the KPA.
					
					 Displayed on the platform of the meeting hall was the fighter of the KPA Air Force which shot down the U.S. imperialists' large spy plane EC-121 when it illegally intruded into the territorial air of the country on April 15, 1969.
					
					 Kim Jong Un made an opening address.
					
					 He pointed out that the enemies kicked off a combined air drill in the wake of the large-scale combined landing exercise, pushing the situation to the brink of a war and threatening peace on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The fact that the meeting of all airpersons of the whole army is being held in Pyongyang, leaving the whole territorial air of the country open under the grave situation in which the air over the south of the peninsula is covered with blowfly-like aircraft of the imperialists signifies the victory of the grit, pluck and mettle of the DPRK and proves that the mental power of the heroic airpersons prevails over the enemies, he noted, and continued:
					
					 The Central Committee of the WPK highly appreciates the patriotic devotion the airpersons are making to protect the territorial air, while performing mentally and physically difficult combat duties all the year round despite sweltering weather and biting cold.
					
					 He said the purpose of the meeting is to glorify the immortal exploits President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed in strengthening the Juche-oriented air force, review the successes and experience gained by it and lessons drawn by it and fully prepare all airpersons including young pilots as phoenixes and death-defying corps in the sky.
					
					 It is also designed to let the whole country know about their patriotic devotion and efforts and make the service personnel of the whole army learn from their noble ideological and moral spirit and thus bring about a fresh turn in rounding off the combat preparations and bolstering up the fighting capability of the KPA, he said. 
					
					 He declared the meeting open, expressing belief that the meeting being held on the occasion of the significant Day of the Sun (birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung) would mark a historic landmark occasion in developing the air force of the KPA.
					
					 KPA Army General Ri Yong Gil, chief of the KPA General Staff, made a report at the meeting.
					
					 He referred to the indefatigable efforts made by the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu to build the air force and deep loving care shown by them. 
					
					 The reporter recalled that Kim Il Sung declared before the whole world the birth of the Juche-based air force by making the historic speech "Let Us Create the Air Force of New Korea," adding that the President organized the Korean Aviation Association before anything else right after the party founding and became its first chairman, devoting his all to developing the young flying corps of new Korea into a regular air force.
					
					 The reporter also recalled that leader Kim Jong Il ceaselessly inspected flying units and sub-units and airfields in order to develop the air force of the KPA into elite one in the world and thus bolstered up the air force into invincible combat force.
					
					 The air force of the KPA is now fully displaying its invincible might under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, the reporter said, adding:
					
					 Kim Jong Un felt more painful than anybody else upon receiving a report that airpersons died while performing their flight duties. He made sure that they enjoyed an eternal life as they are always remembered by the party, the country and its people even after their death.
					
					 The reporter called upon all the commanding officers and airpersons to absolutely trust and follow the Supreme Commander only and become Kim Jong Un's flying corps of human bombs devotedly defending  him.
					
					 The reporter appealed to them to mercilessly blow up the citadel of aggression by making prompt sorties like the lightning over Mt. Paektu and wipe out the enemies to the last one once the Supreme Commander issues an order and thus clearly show the world how the powerful revolutionary Paektusan Army puts an end to the fate of imperialism.
					
					 At the meeting speakers expressed their will to raise a strong wind of making a leap forward in rounding off the combat preparations so that they may make prompt sorties like thunder over Mt. Paektu to strike terror into the hearts of the enemies anytime an order is issued and thus annihilate the bluffing enemies by the air combat method of Korean style.
					
					 Kim Jong Un heard their speeches with keen attention. During a break he met servicepersons of Unit 447 of the KPA Air and Anti-Air Force who successfully fulfilled their difficult flying combat duties and highly appreciated their feats once again.
					
					 He said the Central Committee of the WPK accepted with pleasure the solemn pledge made by the participants.
					
					 He noted that the development of the air force of the KPA would be unthinkable without the dedication and efforts of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He emphasized that the spirit of devotedly defending the country displayed by 14 human bomb-like fighters of Unit 447 of the KPA Air and Anti-Air Force which was stressed in the speeches is the spirit of the second and third Kil Yong Jo and that such spirit is the precious mental treasure which can be hardly obtained with anything.
					
					 He said that the Party Central Committee highly appreciated the spirit displayed by 14 human bomb-like fighters and made public at the meeting the decision to award the title of DPRK Hero to airman Jong Chol Ju who died while performing his combat duty and watches bearing the august name of Kim Jong Il to 13 others.
					
					 He awarded the title of DPRK Hero to Kim Hye Yong, widow of Jong Chol Ju and the watches bearing the august name of Kim Jong Il to Kim Chol, An Song Hyok, Ryang Jong Ryong, Jon Sang Ryol, Kim Yong Chol, Jang Yong Ho, Jo Yong Chol, Kim Chol Un, Han Chol Ho, Cha Yong Jin, Jong Yong Nam, Choe Chang Nam and Jo Sang Gi.
					
					 He set forth important tasks which would serve as guidelines for developing the air force.
					
					 We have latest weapons and powerful and modern military equipment making the enemies tremble with fear but more powerful than them is the KPA's strong spirit of defending the country and transparent ideological and moral spirit, he said. We are not afraid of any formidable enemy as there are such fighters strong in idea.
					
					 He continued: The more zealously the enemies cling to the theory of weapons being all-powerful, the more consistently we should hold fast to the theory of ideology being all-powerful and put main emphasis on it. There is no enemy we cannot beat, if we remain strong in ideology.
					
					 He declared the meeting closed, expressing expectation and conviction that all airpersons would become indomitable pilots performing their combat missions in any adversity.
					
					 Present at the meeting were Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam, So Hong Chan, Hwang Pyong So, Ri Pyong Chol and Jang Tong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Enjoys Performance Given by Moranbong Band
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Enjoys Performance Given by Moranbong Band
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, together with Ri Sol Ju enjoyed a performance given by the Moranbong Band on April 16 to congratulate the participants in the first meeting of airpersons of the KPA.
					 Kim Jong Un appeared in the auditorium.
					
					 Acknowledging the enthusiastic cheers of the airpersons, he met with Ri Un Gyong, widow of Hero airman Kil Yong Jo and family members of airpersons and warmly encouraged them.
					
					 Through female solo and pangchang "Longing for the Leader" and instrumental music and song "We Always Think about the Leader" the performers sang high praises of the undying feats of President Kim Il Sung, who successfully led the cause of independence against imperialism and the socialist cause with his outstanding idea, extraordinary leadership and noble virtues, believing in the people as in Heaven all his life.
					
					 Female duet and pangchang "Shine, Jong Il Peak", light music "The Sound of a Horse's Hooves in Mt. Paektu", female solo and pangchang "Thinking of the General", violin solo and light music "Attraction and Reverence" and female solo "Cradle of My Life" vividly represented the truth that the dignity and spirit of Kim Il Sung's nation have been fully demonstrated and eternal foundations for prosperity of Juche Korea provided thanks to the undying feats of leader Kim Jong Il, who remained loyal to the idea and cause of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Female chorus "The People's Joy", female duet and pangchang "Our Marshal" and female solo and pangchang "A Song of a Big Haul of Fish" emphasized that immensely rosy is the future of Songun Korea as there is the leadership of Kim Jong Un, who is building the strongest power in the world where the dream and ideal of the people are being translated into a reality, in order to realise the desire of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The audience clapped their hands with tears in their eyes when the benevolent images of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu who devoted themselves to strengthening the air force, always finding themselves among the airpersons, were projected on the background of the stage.
					
					 The performance ended with a finale "We Know Nobody but You".
					
					 Kim Jong Un warmly acknowledged the enthusiastic cheers of the performers and the audience and congratulated the performers on their successful performance.
					
					 The performance was enjoyed by Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam, So Hong Chan, Hwang Pyong So, Ri Pyong Chol, Jang Tong Un and Kim Yo Jong, and the airpersons who participated in the meeting and their families.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Participants in First Meeting of Airpersons of KPA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Participants in First Meeting of Airpersons of KPA
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, had a photo session with the participants in the first meeting of airpersons of the KPA on April 17.
					 Kim Jong Un warmly congratulated the participants on the successful meeting and had a photo session with them, saying that the meeting marked a new occasion of turn in glorifying for all ages the undying feats the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed in developing the Juche-based air force and strengthening its combat preparations and fighting capacity in every way.
					
					 He also had a photo session with servicepersons of Unit 447 of the KPA Air and Anti-Air Force and their wives and couples of airpersons and airwomen of the air force. 
					
					 Present there were Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam, So Hong Chan, Hwang Pyong So, Ri Pyong Chol and Jang Tong Un.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Chairman of C.C., Nepal Community Party
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Chairman of C.C., Nepal Community Party
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, on April 11 received a message of greeting from Jalanath Kanal, chairman of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (United Marxist-Leninist).
					 The message said:
					
					 Dear Comrade,
					
					 I, on behalf of our Party Central Committee and on my own behalf, extend wholehearted regards to Comrade Kim Il Sung on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, his 102nd birth anniversary.
					
					 Availing ourselves of this opportunity, we are deeply recollecting the immortal feats of Comrade Kim Il Sung who contributed to the Korean revolution and global peace.
					
					 I express belief that the friendly relations between our two parties and two countries would further develop on good terms in the future.
					
					 I wish Your Excellency good health and great success in your work to achieve the great national unity.
					
					 I hope that the desire of the Korean people to reunify the country independently and peacefully would be realized without fail.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Chairman of Liberal Democratic Party of Russia
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Chairman of Liberal Democratic Party of Russia
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message of greeting from V. V. Zhirinovsky, chairman of the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia, on April 11.
					 The message said:
					
					 Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un,
					
					 I extend congratulations to you and, through you, to all the Korean people on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, the national holiday of the DPRK.
					
					 This holiday goes with the august name of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung who was an outstanding statesman of the DPRK.
					
					 He bequeathed the face-lifted country with developed economy and full of confidence of bright future.
					
					 On this occasion I wish you and all the citizens of the DPRK successes in all creative fields for achieving happiness and prosperity of the country, strengthening peace and security on the Korean peninsula and bringing happiness and well-being to every family in the DPRK.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Chairman of March 26 Movement of Uruguay
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Chairman of March 26 Movement of Uruguay
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, on April 12  received a message of greeting from Ruben Maria Vera, chairperson of the March 26 Movement of Uruguay.
					 The message said:
					
					 We are greatly pleased to celebrate the 102nd birth anniversary of Comrade Kim Il Sung, the leader of the Korean people and the Workers' Party of Korea and hero.
					
					 The great contributions he made in the struggle for socialism are widely known to the world people.
					
					 I extend the warmest fraternal congratulations to you.

articles.title: Congratulations to Malian Prime Minister
articles.content:
Congratulations to Malian Prime Minister
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju on April 17 sent a congratulatory message to Moussa Mara upon his appointment as prime minister of Mali.
					 The message wished the prime minister and the government of Mali success in their work for the socio-economic development of the country, expressing belief that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Japan Urged to Liquidate Crimes Related to Sexual Slavery
articles.content:
Japan Urged to Liquidate Crimes Related to Sexual Slavery
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Members of at least 500 civic and public organizations in south Korea including the Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps and victims to the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army held a meeting in Seoul on April 17 urging Japan to liquidate the crimes related to sexual slavery, according to Thongil News, an internet paper of south Korea.
					 A written request addressed to Japanese and south Korean authorities was released at the meeting.
					
					 Referring to the ongoing talks between Japan and south Korea on the issue of sexual slavery, it said that the talks should not be used for an excuse to find out a diplomatic channel.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should not accept any scheme to decrease the responsibility of the Japanese government, talking about any humanitarian step, it held.
					
					 It said that the international community defined Japan's past sexual slavery as an organized war crime against humanity and has long demanded the Japanese government admit the crime and make an apology and reparation for it. But the Japanese government is turning its back on this, distorting history and evade the blame, it noted, adding:
					
					 To settle the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army is the world's demand of the times which brooks no further delay.
					
					 The Japanese government should open to public all data on the crimes related to sexual slavery, officially admit them and make an apology and reparation for them.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should have a correct attitude and stand on settling the issue of sexual slavery.

articles.title: S. Korean "National Assembly" Slammed for Passing Humiliating Agreement
articles.content:
S. Korean "National Assembly" Slammed for Passing Humiliating Agreement
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification in south Korea made pubic a commentary on April 16 denouncing the puppet National Assembly for passing the humiliating agreement on sharing a fabulous amount of the expenses for the upkeep of the U.S. forces, according to Jaju Minbo, a south Korean internet paper.
					 The commentary recalled that on the same day the NA passed the motion calling for ratification of the special agreement on sharing the expenses for the upkeep of the U.S. forces, much more money than the previous one.
					
					 The passage of the agreement whose term of validity is 5 years makes south Korea compulsorily offer the U.S. about 1 trillion won on an average, the money collected from the people as taxes, every year during the period, it said.
					
					 The NA neither blames the "government" for retrogressively revising the contents of the agreement and submitting the motion calling for ratification nor gets from it the guarantee of correction to the motion, the commentary charged, and went on:
					
					 Moreover, south Korea lost even the opportunity to put under control the situation in which the U.S. forces are illegally accumulating the expenses for their upkeep and filling their own pockets.
					
					 This enables the U.S. to use the expenses for the upkeep of its forces for the transferring of its military bases or other purposes.
					
					 The commentary strongly denounced the NA for passing the humiliating agreement.

articles.title: Results of S. Korean Puppet Prosecution's Investigation Slammed
articles.content:
Results of S. Korean Puppet Prosecution's Investigation Slammed
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- The Bar Association for Democratic Society of south Korea held a press conference on April 15 before the building of the puppet Supreme Prosecutor's Office denouncing the prosecution's investigation  into the faked spy case, according to south Korean MBC.
					 The organization condemned the final results of investigation into the spy case of a public official in Seoul city made public by the prosecution.
					
					 It charged that the prosecution's investigation into the spy case was unreliable and distorted.
					
					 It said it would bring a suit for Nam Jae Jun, director of the Intelligence Service, and Yun Kap Gun of the "investigation team" of the prosecution.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' War Moves Censured
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' War Moves Censured
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification in south Korea held the 175th action for independence, reunification and peace around Kwanghwamun, Seoul on April 16 denouncing the puppet authorities' moves for a war.
					 It condemned the authorities for working hard to conclude a military agreement with Japan.
					
					 The conclusion of the military agreement will result in escalating military tensions on the Korean peninsula and in Northeast Asia as it backs Japan's exercise of the "right to collective self-defense", it said.
					
					 It urged the authorities to clarify the stand refusing the pressure of the U.S. calling for concluding the military agreement with Japan.
					
					 It laid bare the unreasonableness of the conclusion of a humiliating agreement on sharing the expenses for the upkeep of the U.S. forces and the introduction of U.S. weapons.
					
					 Members of the organization staged demonstrations before the general building of the "government" and Chongwadae that day, chanting slogans calling for ensuring peace against war.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Calls for Action against Authorities' Tyranny
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Calls for Action against Authorities' Tyranny 
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- An editorial posted on the south Korean internet paper Voice of People on April 18 called upon the workers to take the lead in the struggle against the authorities' tyranny.
					 The people have to undergo unimaginable sufferings under the present regime which emerged through election rigging backed by all powers, it deplored.
					
					 Where there are oppression and tyranny, there comes strong resistance of the masses, and standing in the van of the resistance are pioneers who steer the struggle despite all suppression and sacrifice.
					
					 As shown by the April 19 uprising, May 18 resistance and June resistance, the pioneers of the struggle were youth and students.
					
					 The people, who are oppressed under the dictatorial regime wrecking democracy, deteriorating the people's livelihood and pursuing plot-breeding politics, are ardently requiring the pioneers of the era. The workers should play an important role.
					
					 Facing the workers are the tasks to stage the May and June general strike for the settlement of the major labor problems including halt to privatization and the resignation of the Park Geun Hye regime.
					
					 The workers should play the role of pioneers in the struggle to realize the desire of all the people who are oppressed under the present regime.

articles.title: DPRK Cultural Exhibition Opens in China
articles.content:
DPRK Cultural Exhibition Opens in China
 Beijing, April 19 (KCNA) -- The DPRK cultural exhibition opened in Zhouhai City, Guangdong Province, China on April 18 under the co-sponsorship of the Korean Overseas Exhibition General Bureau and the Federation of Literature and Art Circles in Zhouhai City, Guangdong Province and the Zhouhai city flower garden on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Displayed at the venue of the exhibition were photos documenting the feats of Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display there were works of the peerlessly great men, books and photos introducing Songun Korea and fine art works associated with wisdom and talents of the Korean people.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were personages of different social standings in Guangdong Province and Zhouhai City, an official of the DPRK embassy in Beijing and a delegate of the Korean Overseas Exhibition General Bureau.
					
					 The chairperson of the Federation of Literature and Art Circles in Zhouhai City, Guangdong Province in a speech said that it was a pleasure to hold the DPRK cultural exhibition in Zhouhai City associated with the footsteps of Kim Jong Il for the first time on the occasion of the birth anniversary of the President.
					
					 China and the DPRK are the friendly neighbors linked by the same mountain and rivers, and the peoples of the two countries have forged the deep friendship, he said, adding that the exhibition will mark a significant occasion in boosting the China-DPRK friendship. 
					
					 The exhibition will last till April 28.

articles.title: Day of Sun Celebrated in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Day of Sun Celebrated in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Events took place in foreign countries between March 31 and April 14 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun).
					 They included a meeting in Norway, seminar in Indonesia, photo and book exhibition in Ethiopia and photo exhibition in South Africa.
					
					 Displayed at the venues of the exhibitions were photos documenting the exploits of the President.
					
					 On display there were works of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, books and photos introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 The chairman of the Ostfold County Committee of the Communist Party of Norway said that Kim Il Sung, the eternal President of the DPRK, is enjoying the boundless reverence of the Korean people and progressive humankind as the pioneer of the cause of independence.
					
					 He praised the President for performing the feats on behalf of the times and humankind, saying that his exploits will shine forever with the victorious advance of socialist Korea.
					
					 The director of the Rabitra Bahtera Pratama Co. of Indonesia praised the President as the father of socialist Korea and the greatest man who built a paradise of the people being envied by the world.
					
					 A congratulatory message to supreme leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting held in Norway.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Foreign Newspapers
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Foreign Newspapers
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers carried special write-ups illustrated with the portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung and his photos on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 The Kuwaiti paper Kuwait Times on April 1 in articles titled "The Korean people celebrate birthday of President Kim Il Sung" and "The sun is everlasting" said that he, the father of socialist Korea, is being praised as the sun for his personality, qualification and exploits.
					
					 The paper said that he founded the Juche idea to usher in the era of independence, a new era of the human history, and pursued the benevolent politics all his life with the warm love for the people.
					
					 It noted that he lies in state at the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun and he is always alive in the hearts of all people as the sun.
					
					 The Cambodian newspaper Kmae Amata on April 1 in an article titled "Kim Il Sung, great man" said:
					
					 He is the founder of the Juche idea and the Songun idea.
					
					 If one believes in the people and rely on them at all times one will always emerge victorious; if one is forsaken by them, one will always fail. This is his maxim.
					
					 He walked along lanes across fields to provide the people with a happy life during the last moments of his life, too.
					
					 The April 3 issue of the Malaysian newspaper Guang Ming Daily in an article titled "The President's desire" said:
					
					 The President believed in people as in Heaven and dedicated his whole life to achieving the prosperity of socialist Korea and bringing the happiness to the people.
					
					 He set it as the supreme principle of activities of the party and state to improve the standard of people's living and devoted himself to doing so.

articles.title: Myanmar Personages Congratulate Kim Jong Un on His Reelection as First Chairman of NDC of DPRK
articles.content:
Myanmar Personages Congratulate Kim Jong Un on His Reelection as First Chairman of NDC of DPRK 
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Personages of Myanmar issued statements on April 10 to congratulate supreme leader Kim Jong Un on his reelection as first chairman of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK.
					 The acting secretary of the Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar said:
					
					 Kim Jong Un's reelection as first chairman of the NDC of the DPRK at the 1st Session of the 13th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK is an expression of the absolute support and trust of all the service personnel and people in him who is carrying forward the noble idea and cause of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It is also the historic event of great significance in the development of the DPRK and the great honor and joy of the Korean people.
					
					 His reelection to the top post of the state makes it possible for the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the Korean people to wage a dynamic struggle for building a thriving nation and reunifying the country along the road indicated by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 I extend warm congratulations and best wishes to Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Tin Tun, director of the Myanmar Medical Research Institute, said:
					
					 Kim Jong Un's reelection as first chairman of the NDC of the DPRK is a demonstration of the indomitable faith and will of the army and people of the DPRK to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche under his leadership.
					
					 The DPRK's future is bright and rosy as it is led by him.
					
					 I extend full support and solidarity to the WPK and the Korean people in their justifiable struggle.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Studied and Disseminated Worldwide
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Studied and Disseminated Worldwide
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" was widely introduced, published and disseminated by many countries and international and regional bodies for two years.
					 The full text or gist of the work were reported by the Chinese Xinhua News Agency, Lao News Agency, Guinean Domestic Broadcasting Service, Cambodian paper Pracheachon, Bangladeshi paper Blits, Nepali paper Charcha, DR Congo paper L'Avenir and the German paper Rote Fahne.
					
					 They were also posted by more than 40 political parties, organizations and international and regional bodies on their websites.
					
					 They included the Moscow Workers' Union of Russia, Communist Workers' Party of Belarus, Socialist Party of Romania, British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, Kim Jong Il's Library of Ecuador, Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK, Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship, Korean Friendship Association and the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions.
					
					 The work was brought out in booklet by foreign publishing houses and book releasing ceremonies were held with splendor.
					
					 Among the publishing houses were a printing shop in Dandong, China, Khabarovsk Territory Publishing House of Russia, Iranian Hadian Publishing House, publishing houses in Germany, Romania, Czech Republic, Switzerland and Kyrgyzstan, N. K. Publishing House in Enugu, Nigeria, Nath Publishing House of Egypt, Publishing House of the Workers' Party of Mexico, a publishing house in Peru, Canta Clara Publishing House of Venezuela and a publishing house in Dominica.
					
					 The work was studied and disseminated through seminars, briefings and reading sessions.
					
					 Political parties, organizations and personages of different countries released statements after studying the work.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige Primera Conferencia de Pilotos de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige Primera Conferencia de Pilotos de EPC
 Pyongyang, 20 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar con solemnidad el dia 15 en esta capital la Primera Conferencia de Pilotos del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					 El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del EPC, dirigio la conferencia.
					
					 La presente conferencia es una gran reunion historica en que participaron todos los pilotos de todo el ejercito.
					
					 En la tribuna estaba exhibido el avion de las fuerzas aereas del EPC que derribo el 15 de abril de 1969 el avion espia de gran tamano del imperialismo norteamericano "EC-121" infiltrado ilegalmente en el espacio aereo jurisdiccional de la patria.
					
					 El Mariscal pronuncio un discurso de inauguracion.
					
					 En su discurso, el Mariscal recordo que una vez terminado el entrenamiento combinado de desembarco, los enemigos libran el otro simulacro aereo, de manera que llevan la situacion al borde de la guerra y amenazan la paz de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					 Subrayo que bajo la situacion tan peligrosa en que el cielo sureno de la Peninsula Coreana esta cubierto de los moscones imperialistas, llamo a los pilotos de todo el ejercito a la Conferencia, lo que significa la victoria del coraje, audacia y temperamento y demuestra que el mundo espiritual de los heroicos pilotos predomina a los enemigos.
					
					 Destaco que el Comite Central del Partido evalua altamente el sacrificio patriotico de los aviadores que dedican todo lo suyo a la defensa del cielo de la patria cumpliendo todo el ano el servicio militar espiritual y fisicamente alerto aun en medio de calor sofocante y frio.
					
					 Se refirio a que el objetivo de la convocacion de la conferencia es para glorificar las inmortales hazanas del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il realizadas en el fortalecimiento de las fuerzas aereas autoctonas, hacer balance de los exitos, experiencias y lecciones alcanzados por ellas y formar con mas firmeza a todos los pilotos inclusive los de nueva generacion como ave fenix y peloton suicida de cielo.
					
					 Agrego que el fin del certamen es tambien para dar a conocer a todo el pais la abnegacion patriotica y los esfuerzos de ellos e infundir a  los oficiales y soldados de todo el ejercito el elevado mundo ideo-espiritual, asi que se registre nuevo cambio en la preparacion perfecta de combate y el fortalecimiento de combatividad del EPC.
					
					 Expresando su conviccion de que la conferencia celebrada con motivo del Dia del Sol, servira de un hito historico en el fortalecimiento de las fuerzas aereas, declaro la apertura de la Primera Conferencia de Pilotos del EPC.
					
					 El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres del EPC, Ri Yong Gil, jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, quien recordo los incansables esfuerzos de los grandes hombres del monte Paektu por la construccion de las fuerzas aereas y sus benevolencias.
					
					 Al pronunciar el historico discurso "Construyamos una aviacion para la nueva Corea", el Presidente Kim Il Sung declaro a todo el mundo la fundacion de las autoctonas fuerzas aereas e inmediatamente despues de la fundacion del partido, organizo ante todo la Asociacion Aeronautica de Corea y haciendose su primer presidente dedico todo lo suyo para desarrollar la aviacion recien organizada de la nueva Corea como fuerzas aereas regulares, senalo el informante y continuo:
					
					 Para fortalecer las fuerzas aereas como unidad selecta de talla mundial, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il visito una tras otra las unidades y subunidades aereas y los aerodromos para consolidar a las fuerzas aereas como invencible fila de combate.
					
					 Hoy dia, las fuerzas aereas demuestran sin reserva su poderio invencible bajo la direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Es precisamente el Comandante Supremo quien tras informarse de los pilotos caidos durante el tiempo de servicio de vuelo, se sentia apenado mas que nadie e hizo que ellos disfrutaran de una vida inmortal, a quienes conoce el partido y recuerdan la patria y el pueblo, aunque dejo de latir el corazon.
					
					 Todos los comandantes y los pilotos deben ser la aviacion de bala y bomba de Kim Jong Un y el grupo suicida de cielo que confian solo en el Comandante Supremo y vuelan por ruta aerea de defensa a ultranza al lider.
					
					 Deben demostrar claramente a todo el mundo como el poderoso ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu pone el punto final al destino del imperialismo tras aniquilar sin piedad y sin rastro el baluarte de agresion  y a los enemigos si el Comandante Supremo les da la orden de salida.
					
					 Los intervencionistas expusieron la voluntad de levantar una ola de salto para perfeccionar los preparativos de combate aunque se de la orden en cualquier momento y eliminar despiadadamente a los enemigos fanfarrones con el metodo de navegacion a nuestro estilo.
					
					 El Comandante Supremo escucho con atencion las intervenciones y en el tiempo de descanso, se reunio con los pilotos heroicos de la Unidad 447 de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas del EPC quienes cumplieron satisfactoriamente la complicada mision de combate y volvio evaluar altamente sus proezas.
					
					 Dijo que el CC del PTC acepta el juramento tomado por los participantes.
					
					 Destaco que al margen del sacrificio y los esfuerzos de los Generalisimos, no se puede imaginar del fortalecimiento de nuestras fuerzas aereas.
					
					 Elogio que el espiritu de defensa a ultranza a la patria de los 14 pilotos de bomba humana de dicha unidad citado en las intervenciones, es el espiritu de segundo y tercer Kil Yong Jo y el precioso patrimonio espiritual que no se puede cambiar con nada.
					
					 Al decir que el CC del PTC evalua altamente el espiritu de ellos, declaro a los participantes la decision de otorgar el titulo del Heroe de la RPDC a Jong Chol Ju caido en medio del cumplimiento de la mision de combate  y a otros 13, el reloj con la inscripcion del nombre del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					 El Comandante Supremo entrego el titulo de Heroe a Kim Hye Yong, esposa de Jong Chol Ju, y el reloj, a Kim Chol, An Song Hyok, Ryang Jong Ryong, Jon Sang Ryol, Kim Yong Chol, Jang Yong Ho, Jo Yong Chol, Kim Chol Un, Han Chol Ho, Cha Yong Jin, Jong Yong Nam, Choe Chang Nam y Jo Sang Gi.
					
					 Presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia en el fortalecimiento de las fuerzas aereas.
					
					 Recalco que tenemos las armas sofisticadas y los modernos equipos militares que estremecen a los enemigos, pero lo mas poderoso es el ardiente espiritu de defensa a la patria y el firme estado ideo-espiritual del EPC y agrego que gracias a los fuertes en la ideologia, no tememos a los enemigos poderosos.
					
					 Si recurren los enemigos a la teoria de omnipotencia del arma hay que dar preferencia a la ideologia tomando fuertemente la teoria de omnipotencia de la idea, dijo y recalco que si tenemos la idea fuerte, podemos vencer a  cualesquier enemigos.
					
					 Expresando la esperanza y la conviccion de que todos los aviadores seran halcones rojos, declaro la clausura de la conferencia.
					
					 Estuvieron presentes en la ocasion Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam, So Hong Chan, Hwang Pyong So, Ri Pyong Chol y Jang Tong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia funcion de Banda Moranbong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia funcion de Banda Moranbong
 Pyongyang, 20 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, junto con su esposa Ri Sol Ju, presencio el dia 16 la funcion de la Banda Moranbong en honor de los participantes en la Primera Conferencia de Pilotos del EPC.
					 El Comandante Supremo salio al palco del teatro.
					
					 Se reunio con Ri Un Gyong, esposa del piloto heroe Kil Yong Jo, y otras familias de los pilotos y les estimulo respondiendo a las calurosas aclamaciones de los pilotos.
					
					 A traves del solo femenino y panchang "Alma de anoranza al Lider" y el instrumento musical y cancion "Siempre pensamos en el Lider", las ejecutantes elogiaron las inmortales hazanas del Presidente Kim Il Sung quien con la destacada idea, la sabia direccion y la noble virtud, condujo a la victoria la causa independiente antiimperialista, la del socialismo y dedico toda su vida para la felicidad del pueblo.
					
					 El duo femenino y pangchang "Brilla, pico Jong Il", la musica ligera "Trote de caballo del Paektu", el solo femenino y panchang "Pensamiento en el General", el solo de violin y musica ligera "Encanto y veneracion" y el solo femenino "Nido de mi vida" describieron con emocion que gracias a la gran direccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, fiel a la idea y causa del Presidente, se pusieron de pleno manifiesto la dignidad e impetu de la nacion de sol y se ha preparado el eterno cimiento para la prosperidad de Corea del Juche.
					
					 El coro femenino "Jubilo del pueblo", el duo femenino y pangchang "Nuestro Mariscal", el solo femenino y pangchang "Cancion de abundante pesca en el mar" cantaron en tono patetico que es muy radiante el futuro de Corea del Songun porque lo dirige el Mariscal quien en pleno acato al deseo de los Generalisimos levanta en esta tierra una gran potencia que haga florecer el sueno y el ideal del pueblo.
					
					 Cada vez que aparecen en el fondo de la escena las afectuosas imagenes de los grandes Hombres del monte Paektu, quienes dedicaron todo lo suyo para el fortalecimiento y el desarrollo de las fuerzas aereas estando siempre junto con los aviadores, los espectadores les dieron efusivos aplausos derramando lagrimas desenfrenadas.
					
					 La funcion termino con el epilogo "No sabemos a nadie sino a Usted".
					
					 El Mariscal respondio cordialmente a las entusiastas aclamaciones de las ejecutantes y espectadores y felicito el exito de su funcion.
					
					 Le acompanaron en verla Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam, So Hong Chan, Hwang Pyong So, Ri Pyong Chol, Jang Tong Un y Kim Yo Jong, los pilotos y familias participantes en la conferencia.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un toma foto con los participantes en Conferencia de Pilotos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un toma foto con los participantes en Conferencia de Pilotos
 Pyongyang, 20 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, tomo el dia 17 fotos con los participantes en la Primera Conferencia de Pilotos del EPC.
					 El Comandante Supremo felicito calurosamente a los participantes quienes realizaron con exito la conferencia diciendo que la Primera Conferencia de Pilotos del EPC sirve de un motivo de nuevo cambio para hacer brillar de generacion en generacion las inmortales hazanas de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il en el desarrollo de las fuerzas aereas autoctonas, en los preparativos de combate y el fortalecimiento por todos los medios de la combatividad del ejercito aereo.
					
					 Llamo a su lado a los aviadores heroicos de la Unidad 447 de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas del EPC y sus esposas, los pilotos conyugales y las aviadoras y tomo foto junto con estos.
					
					 Participaron en la ocasion Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam, So Hong Chan, Hwang Pyong So, Ri Pyong Chol y Jang Tong Un.
